title: Pilate's Key
description: Life's A Beach for John Pilate…Umbrella drink in hand and on the mend from a near-death experience, John Pilate is just starting to relax on the sun-soaked beaches of Key West when a dead man falls in his lap. Now he has blood on his hands, a mysterious poker chip in his pocket, shadows over his shoulder and a sexy cop in his bed. John Pilate is in trouble again--and the only way out is to hit the high seas and find the key…Pilate's Key. A 2012 Kindle Book Review Awards semi-finalist for Best Mystery/Thriller! Named a "Page Turner" by Shelf Unbound Literary Magazine!
author: J. Alexander Greenwood
